DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing PEG 3350 Laxative Placebo Treatment Occasional Constipation ( Study CL2007-12 ) ( P08216 )
DOC.criteria: Subjects ( parents/guardians minor ) must demonstrate willingness participate ( children/wards participate ) study comply procedure sign write informed consent . Minor subject must provide write assent . Subjects must 17 year age old . Subjects must present current diagnosis untreated constipation 7 day less base signs/symptoms strain hard lumpy stool OR inability BM within 48 hour prior randomization trial . Subjects must OTC laxative user treatment occasional constipation ( define use nonprescription laxative treat least 3 episode constipation within last 12 month prior randomization ) . Subjects must willing use study drug 7 day direct , must agree record bowel movement ( frequency , consistency , etc . ) accurately consistently daily diary , make two clinic visit . Subjects must otherwise good health , determine physical exam medical history . Subjects must agree use product treat constipation course study . Subjects must agree use medication know cause constipation course study . Subjects must agree maintain similar diet week prior randomization end study . Female subject must either surgically sterile , 2 year postmenopausal , attest use acceptable method contraception ( include hormonal birth control , IUD , double barrier method , vasectomized partner ) . In female childbearing potential , urine pregnancy test ( HCG ) must negative Baseline . Subjects must able read diary English . Subjects currently doctor 's care treatment constipation . Subjects current constipation episode one week prior randomization . Subjects history chronic constipation due underlying cause ( inflammatory bowel disease , etc. ) . Subjects history 3 month constipation past year . Subjects severe abdominal pain predominant constipation symptom . Subjects previously use polyethylene glycol laxative . Subjects celiac disease know gluten sensitivity . Subjects history colorectal cancer , anal abscess , anal fistula , anal fissure , anal stenosis , gastric retention obstruction , bowel resection , rectocele , colostomy . Subjects know renal hepatic insufficiency . Subjects gastrointestinal bleed acute infection . Subjects history alcohol drug abuse . Subjects history psychiatric disorder . Subjects history significant ongoing medical problem , include kidney disease , schedule surgical procedure . Subjects currently take take within 7 day randomization concomitant medication cause constipation include example opiate , antidepressant , SSRI 's , antimotility agent , anticholinergic , etc . Subjects plan use laxatives treatment period study medication . Subjects , opinion investigator , include study reason , include inability follow study procedure .
